## BaseStyle type

The object that defines what way an item of a \[\[DataSource\]\] should be decoded to assemble a tile. \[\[Style\]\] is describing which features are shown on a map and in what way they are being shown.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type BaseStyle<Technique, Params> = Partial<Params> & {
    description?: string;
    styleSet?: string;
    category?: string | JsonExpr;
    technique: Technique;
    renderOrder?: number | JsonExpr;
    minZoomLevel?: number | JsonExpr;
    maxZoomLevel?: number | JsonExpr;
    transient?: boolean;
    debug?: boolean;
    metricUnit?: "Meter" | "Pixel";
    labelProperty?: string;
    attr?: Partial<Params>;
};
```
